name: GibCode
tag_list: mobile-payments, near-field-communications, nfc, cloud-processing, digital-wallet, qr-code, barcode
overview:
The GibCode System is a mobile payments platfrom that allows users to store their payment details in the Digital Wallet. The user is able to create a payment and send to any of their Facebook friends, display the payment as a unique barcode on their smart device allowing anyone with a smart device to scan and redeem or email the payment to anyone.

Businesses, Non-Profit Organizations and others are able to untilize the GibCode System and create unique barcodes that can be printed on their receipts, event banners, marketing materials, TV commercials, etc. allowing anyone with a smart device with the ability to scan and pay.

The GibCode System is the most well rounded mobile payment option on the market today. The application is web-based and occurs in the cloud so no app is needed for a users specific device.
